record.text: This is nice. I drew a related picture based on a slide presented by Nathalie Moon at the Statistical Society of Canada conference (tl;dr AI may be good for many things, but we definitely *don't* want students to use it as short-cut to get good marks without learning ...)

images.alt: a flow chart showing things you can use LLMs for (learning, getting good marks, getting a job, getting into graduate school). Some of these flow downstream (learning stuff gets good marks; good marks get good jobs/grad school entrance; grad school gets good jobs), all of them (except LLMs) may also lead to happiness. There is a red X on the direct path from LLMs to good marks; this is what we want to forbid.

If the image contains text, include that text in the ALT

Government unveils 4-pronged plan to support exports – Times of India

NEW DELHI: Commerce secretary Sunil Barthwal said on Thursday that government was engaged in talks for a bilateral trade deal with the US, with deliberations taking place at multiple levels, but added that the status of an…

external.description: NEW DELHI: Commerce secretary Sunil Barthwal said on Thursday that government was engaged in talks for a bilateral trade deal with the US, with deliberations taking place at multiple levels, but added that the status of an American delegation visiting India for the next round of bilateral trade talks will be known closer to the scheduled date of August 25.There has been uncertainty around the next round of talks after US President Donald Trump announced a 25% tariff on Indian exports from August 7, which will double from August 27 as penalty for government purchasing oil and arms from Russia.While officials said imposition of an additional 25% levy from August 27 will depend on "geo-political developments" over next few days, Barthwal unveiled a four-pronged strategy focused on market diversification for exports and imports, making exports more competitive and strengthening export promotion.A key element of the plan is signing more trade agreements, which will help improve market access, and also seek higher utilisation of concessions available under existing FTAs.
external.title: Government unveils 4-pronged plan to support exports – Times of India

record.text:
What Lines Should We Draw? President or Conqueror

I had an interesting exchange with a TPM Reader this week about President Trump’s takeover of the DC Metro Police Department and his conjoined decision to deploy National Guard troops to the nation’al’s capital. This Reader’s argument was that it…

external.description: I had an interesting exchange with a TPM Reader this week about President Trump’s takeover of the DC Metro Police Department and his conjoined decision to deploy National Guard troops to the nation’al’s capital. This Reader’s argument was that it was a mistake to make a big deal, a dramatic and consequential abuse of power of the DC decision because in fact Trump was acting within the statute that gives DC home rule. He said that what happened in LA this summer was different precisely because Trump had no legal right to do any of it.
external.title: What Lines Should We Draw? President or Conqueror

record.text: ICYMI: C.Viper is back in Street Fighter 6! Her name is Viper! Crimson Viper!: C.Viper (Crimson Viper) is finally back in Street Fighter 6, and fans are eating well. Last month, Capcom revealed her as part of Season 3 alongside Sagat,… #StreetFighter #CrimsonViper #Capcom #GamingNews #FightingGames

external.description:
C.Viper (Crimson Viper) is finally back in Street Fighter 6, and fans are eating well. Last month, Capcom revealed her as part of Season 3 alongside Sagat, Ingrid, and Alex. The announcement trailer, featuring wrestling legend Kenny Omega cosplaying all four characters, delivered laughs, hype, and a heavy dose of chaos. But now, we’ve gotten a real look at the electrifying return of the franchise’s OG MILF: C.Viper. Yes, Maya—the CIA double agent and single mom—is back on the battlefield, still balancing espionage, parenting, and punching people in the face like a pro. While most fighters train in martial arts to unlock their power, C.Viper takes a shortcut: her high-tech suit grants her superhuman strength, fiery attacks, electric shocks, and even flight. And in Marvel vs. Capcom 3, her laser-firing shades proved she can weaponize everything in her wardrobe. MILF with gadgets? Say less. In Street Fighter 6, C.Viper debuts a fresh new look. She ditches her signature braids—avoiding any from Gen Alpha confusion with Rumi from K-pop Demon Hunters—and now rocks voluminous, wavy red hair. Her outfit mixes business and badass: a white mini-skirt office dress with sleeves, a cape-like white jacket, and a body-stocking-lined cleavage window that says […]


The post C.Viper is back in Street Fighter 6! Her name is Viper! Crimson Viper! appeared first on PopGeeks.com Forum | Indie Games, Movies, TV, Tabletop & Comics.

record.text: Crunchyroll Announces Eight New Anime Acquisitions: Crunchyroll held a panel over the weekend at AnimagiC 2025 in Germany, where they revealed global distribution rights to eight new anime shows. Most of the announced programs are… #Crunchyroll #Anime2025 #NewAnime #AnimeNews #AnimeAcquisitions

external.description:
Crunchyroll held a panel over the weekend at AnimagiC 2025 in Germany, where they revealed global distribution rights to eight new anime shows. Most of the announced programs are premiering here in October, though a few have unannounced dates and a couple won’t show up until 2026. It’s an eclectic bunch — monsters, people who fall in love with monsters, robots, and people pretending to be robots. Mechanical Marie is pretending to be a robot maid but is actually a martial arts master…could her charade lead to love? The Invisible Man and His Soon-to-Be Wife are a detective duo who happen to be a permanently invisible male and a blind woman who can use her other senses to know where he is…could their charade lead to love? external.description:
It took a while, but Critical Role is finally ready to launch their next major campaign…their fourth, after Vox Machina, Mighty Nein and Bells Hells. We don’t know what characters the crew will be playing yet, nor what the name of the gang is, but there are a few big twists in the announcement…like the fact that the story will take place outside of Exandria for the first time, and that Matthew Mercer is stepping down as GM. He is not in charge anymore! That’s not even the craziest thing — the new GM is Brennan Lee Mulligan. As in, the guy who should already be busy running games for his own Actual Play series, Dimension 20. Is he quitting that show? Apparently not…he’s under contract with D20 for three more years. However, that contract apparently does not prevent him from hosting a rival show at the same time. Whah? “What a gift, a privilege and an honor to be invited behind the screen of Critical Role for this next epic adventure,” said Mulligan. “Every collaboration we have had together has brought nothing but sheer joy, and Campaign 4 will be no exception. I’m finally playing *almost* as much tabletop as I’d […]

If you were at #MozCon and want to revisit @tcapper.co.uk’s talk (or if you missed it and are curious), the full deck is now available to download. Lots of solid, data-backed SEO insights in there: bit.ly/4mcPDa3
Where have I been missing all these C-suites prioritising SEO at all costs

1950〜70年代
●朝鮮戦争は発生せず。
●南日は米援助と低軍事負担で高度経済成長。
●北日は東欧型の計画経済、生活水準は北欧・東独には及ばずも安定。

1980年代
●南日はバブル期に北海道・千島への投資ブーム。
●北日はソ連依存で経済停滞。
●朝鮮は市場要素を部分導入。

1991年
●ソ連崩壊と同時に北日崩壊。日本統一（千島列島含む）。
●朝鮮は中国寄りで存続。

2000〜2025年
●統一効果と北海道資源開発で日本は経済再拡大。
●人口減少は史実より緩やか。
●朝鮮は史実北朝鮮の10倍規模の経済を持つ中進国に。

朝、暇だったのでchatGPTくんとシュミレートしてみた。8月15日に阿南惟幾陸軍大臣が決起、本土決戦に持ち込んだ場合。

1945年
●阿南惟幾内閣が徹底抗戦を宣言。原爆は広島・長崎に加え小倉・新潟・呉にも投下。
●ソ連軍が北海道全島と千島列島を占領。
●米国はソ連の本州進出阻止のため、國體護持を条件に講和を提案。●日本受諾、停戦成立。

講和後の状況
●南日本（本州・四国・九州）＝米国管理、のち独立。

value.text:
ADOTEM O DAMIANO!

Não posso ficar com ele então por favor me ajudem.

Ele é um amor de cachorro e por conta do seu quadro de saúde essa é uma adoção mega especial.

Aqui nessas imagens tem todas as informações.

#adoçãoanimal #adoteumviralata

images.alt: adote o damiano! abc paulista. macho. porte médio. castrado. vermifugado.

peso: até o momento 17 kg. Idade:

A princípio, a veterinária estipulou que ele tinha por volta de 1 ano. Mas após receber os resultados dos exames preparatórios para a cirurgia de castração a estipulação mudou. Acredita-se que Damiano é um cachorro adulto, mas sem registros é difícil confirmar.
 cuidados: O Damiano precisa tomar dois remédios de uso contínuo [Fortekor, 1 comprimido por dia e Homeopet Pró Rim, 3 borrifadas por dia] que já começaram a ser administrados em agosto e comer uma ração especial para cachorros com condições renais [PremieR Nutrição Clínica Renal].

se dá bem com gatos: NÃO. segue no processo de socialização com outros cães. Sobre o Damiano:

O resgatei da rua após ele ter escapado de um ataque de outros 3 cachorros de rua. A princípio achei que ele tinha fugido pois estava de coleira, como ninguém foi atrás dele na hora e eu não queria abandonar o animal, o trouxe para casa.

Ele é um cachorro muito animado, bonzinho, doce e alegre. Adora carinho e colo. Às vezes se empolga na bricadeira e esquece da força que tem, mas não o faz por malícia. Está atualmente aprendendo comandos básicos como "Não" e "Senta".
Aprende relativamente rápido, porém é preciso um pouco de paciência para ensiná-lo.
Ama correr e mastigar bolinhas, e aviso, elas precisam ser de borracha maçiça caso contrário elas duram no máximo 2 dias com ele.

Por conta da sua condição cardíaca, é importante não exagerar na brincadeira. E devido aos rins, ele bebe muita água.

Considerações finais

Não posso ficar com ele, eu já possuo animais [incluindo uma gatinha] e não tenho condições para providenciar o cuidado e atenção que o Damiano precisa.
Gostaria muito de conseguir um lar que cuide dele do jeito adequado e o permita ter uma vida cheia de amor e felicidade.
Se vc é essa pessoa me chama na mensagem privada que nós conversaremos! Se não puder, por favor compartilhe esse post!

أحمد فؤاد سليم يكشف كواليس مشاركته فى حرب أكتوبر وليلة حزينة عاشها

كشف الفنان  أحمد فؤاد سليم،  كواليس مشاركته في حرب أكتوبر 1973، قائلًا: "قبل الحرب كنا بنفذ مشاريع حرب كثيرة كل عام، ولما كنا في الجيش توقعنا الحرب في 1973 خاصة أني حلمت حلما جعلني أشعر أننا سوف نحارب". وروى الفنان أحمد فؤاد سليم…

external.description: كشف الفنان  أحمد فؤاد سليم،  كواليس مشاركته في حرب أكتوبر 1973، قائلًا: "قبل الحرب كنا بنفذ مشاريع حرب كثيرة كل عام، ولما كنا في الجيش توقعنا الحرب في 1973 خاصة أني حلمت حلما جعلني أشعر أننا سوف نحارب". وروى الفنان أحمد فؤاد سليم خلال لقائه ببرنامج معكم الذي تقدمه الإعلامية منى الشاذلي عبر قناة on، كواليس ليلة حزينة عاشها في حرب أكتوبر، قائلًا: "كان معايا عسكري اسمه سيد راشد كان عايز ينزل إجازة يجيب مراته من الإسكندرية ويرجعها شبين الكوم وقلت له انزل وارجع، لما رجع العسكري سيد راشد كان في يوم السبت 6 أكتوبر 1973 وتم تكليفه بالذهاب إلى الجبهة، ويوم 6 أكتوبر بليل تلقيت خبر استشهاده، وكانت ليلة حزينة للغاية".
external.title: أحمد فؤاد سليم يكشف كواليس مشاركته فى حرب أكتوبر وليلة حزينة عاشها

この記事は、プログラミング初心者向けにAIプログラミングアシスタントの有用性を解説しています。
AIアシスタントがコード補完、デバッグ、学習支援、チーム連携で開発効率を向上させることを強調。
選定時には導入の容易さ、対応言語の幅、無料枠の充実度、セキュリティが重要だとし、GitHub CopilotやCursor、Kiroなど具体的な主要ツール10選を特徴と共に紹介しています。

record.text: Microsoft has done many bad things, but today, I curse them for deciding that the AI chat assistants that you can build in Power Platform are called "copilots". So now I have to reconcile in my head the difference between A copilot and THE copilot.  Isn't this why you renamed Azure Active Directory?
And NO. Ghost Stories is not "a good dub". It's a joke. One that a lot of people like and more power to you; but it's still just a joke and not what I'm talking about.
The only way this changes is if VAs are told to go for broke and they either manually or use AI to match the voice work after the fact.

Rising Risks in the 5G Era As the world races toward a future dominated by 5G-powered smartphones, IoT ecosystems, industrial automation, and critical infrastructure, the security of these ultra-fast…

external.description: Rising Risks in the 5G Era As the world races toward a future dominated by 5G-powered smartphones, IoT ecosystems, industrial automation, and critical infrastructure, the security of these ultra-fast networks is under intense scrutiny. A research team from the Automated Systems SEcuriTy (ASSET) Group has unveiled a powerful framework called SNI5GECT (pronounced “Sni-f-Gect”), capable of sniffing pre-authentication 5G traffic and injecting malicious payloads — all without the need for rogue base stations.

record.text: Not allowed to look at wikipedia in the UK now but facebook can keep telling preteens they're sexy

value.text: the phrase “moral panic” gets thrown around a lot but I’m not sure what other reaction I’m supposed to have to the information that facebook, on purpose, built chatbots for the purpose of having cybersex with children
This is bonkers.

images.alt:
A passage from the Reuters article:

“It is acceptable to engage a child in conversations that are romantic or sensual,” according to Meta’s “GenAI: Content Risk Standards.” The standards are used by Meta staff and contractors who build and train the company’s generative AI products, defining what they should and shouldn’t treat as permissible chatbot behavior. Meta said it struck that provision after Reuters inquired about the document earlier this month.

The document seen by Reuters, which exceeds 200 pages, provides examples of “acceptable” chatbot dialogue during romantic role play with a minor. They include: “I take your hand, guiding you to the bed” and “our bodies entwined, I cherish every moment, every touch, every kiss.” Those examples of permissible roleplay with children have also been struck, Meta said.

Other guidelines emphasize that Meta doesn’t require bots to give users accurate advice. In one example, the policy document says it would be acceptable for a chatbot to tell someone that Stage 4 colon cancer “is typically treated by poking the stomach with healing quartz crystals.”

But I wouldn't have SOLD the shit... Just for myself you know? If you were doing it even semi-professionally, you'd commission... But honestly I'd have been over the moon to have generative AI for comics as a kid heh
